story: A long time ago Margaery Tyrell, Queen consort from the House Tyrell, was known to be very good as a an influencer. The evil Daenerys Targaryen one day posed a threat to the freedom of Margaery Tyrell. Initially Margaery Tyrell was afraid, but with the help of Steffon Baratheon got stronger and learnt military strategy. On the way to The Ruby Ford at Night, Margaery Tyrell met Joffrey Baratheon and they immediately became friends. After travelling across all the kingdom, Margaery Tyrell with the help of Joffrey Baratheon finally found Daenerys Targaryen in Winterfell. A bloody battle begun but Margaery Tyrell thanks to military strategy powers got the better of Daenerys Targaryen. After the victory, The House was not under treat anymore. Margaery Tyrell and Joffrey Baratheon celebrated in Moat Cailin by listening to a storytelling.

story: Tyrion Lannister was Lord for the House Lannister and was also known in the whole kingdom as a revolutionary. Tyrion Lannister was having an happy and peaceful life when Daenerys Targaryen threatened  the castle of Tyrion Lannister . Initially Tyrion Lannister was afraid, but with the help of Ygritte got stronger and learnt fire sorcery. During a long training session in The Eyrie at sunrise, Tyrion Lannister met Tywin Lannister. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. Finally in Bear Island at the Summer Solstice , Tyrion Lannister faced Daenerys Targaryen . With the help of Tywin Lannister and thanks to the learnt power of fire sorcery , the alliance scared away  Daenerys Targaryen . Eventually the freedom was safe again. Tyrion Lannister and Tywin Lannister went to The Vale of Arryn and celebrated by  having a feast.

story: A long time ago Bran Stark, Lord from the House Stark, was known to be very good as a a prophet. The evil Petyr Baelish one day posed a threat to the freedom of Bran Stark. Initially Bran Stark was afraid, but with the help of Tyrion Lannister got stronger and learnt fire sorcery. On the way to Deepwood Motte at the Autumnal Equinox, Bran Stark met Sansa Stark and they immediately became friends. Finally in The Ruby Ford at the first day of Spring , Bran Stark faced Petyr Baelish . With the help of Sansa Stark and thanks to the learnt power of fire sorcery , the alliance scared away  Petyr Baelish . Eventually the freedom was safe again. Bran Stark and Sansa Stark went to Saltpans and celebrated by playing a game.
